audio_item.dc.abstract: [Side 1] : [Part 1] : Larry Davidow talking about Communist infiltration in Labor Unions in the United States.
[Side 2] : [Part 2] : Larry Davidow talking about Communist infiltration in Labor Unions in the United States.
